definition: to comply with/to obey
to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
surname Cong

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor

sentences.english: And the inhaling steroids compliance and lung function were compared.
sentences.chinese: 并观察依从性与哮喘肺功能改善的关系。

sentences.english: Introduction of additional cleaning services is easier than improvements in hand-hygiene compliance.
sentences.chinese: 倡导更多的清洁比提高手卫生的依从性容易。

sentences.english: Irbesartan therapy was well tolerated and was not associated with an excess of any side effects.
sentences.chinese: 依贝沙坦治疗依从性良好，无过度副作用。

sentences.english: Attention should be paid to drug resistance and dependence in the discharge medication of tuberculosis patients.
sentences.chinese: 对结核病患者出院带药应该注意耐药性和患者依从性。

sentences.english: Under His teaching every relationship becomes a lesson in love. T-20. V. 3
sentences.chinese: 依从他的教诲每一种关系都成了关于爱的课程。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the compliance of the patients with remission stage of bronchial asthma and the relative factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨缓解期哮喘患者用药依从性及其影响因素。

sentences.english: Rhema I will let down the net .
sentences.chinese: 但依从你的话，我就下网。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the use of anti-hypertensive and to evaluate the compliance of patients at community.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨社区高血压患者药物应用情况及依从性。

sentences.english: Objective:To probe into the influence of nursing intervention on medicine- taking compliance of schizophrenia patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨护理干预对精神分裂症病人服药依从性的影响。

sentences.english: How much adherence is required for ARVs to be effective?
sentences.chinese: 需要怎样的依从性才能使抗病毒药物有效？

sentences.english: This kind of information is essential to an organisation's strategic compliance programme, " said Woburn."
sentences.chinese: 这类信息对一个企业的战略依从程序尤为重要。

sentences.english: But because you say so, I will let down the nets.
sentences.chinese: 但依从你的话，我就下网。

sentences.english: Patients' medication adherence significantly improved with FDC.
sentences.chinese: FDC制剂可以显著改善患者的服药依从性。

sentences.english: H. Was adherence acceptable in all groups?
sentences.chinese: 组内的依从性是否可接受？

sentences.english: Eloise got up from the window seat and felt in the dark for her shoes.
sentences.chinese: 艾萝依从窗座起身摸黑找她的鞋子。

sentences.english: RESULTS The level of compliance at the end of duty was 95.0%.
sentences.chinese: 结果工作结束后洗手依从性为95。

definition: to disobey/to defy/deliberately going against (rule, convention, sb's wishes etc)
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
to obey/to observe/to follow
obedient/to comply/to submit/to defer
to allow (sb to do as he pleases)
to let (sth happen)/to allow (sb to do sth)/to submit to/to yield
to disobey/to defy an edict/to violate/to go against/to run counter to
to give one's assent/to consent
to conform/to obey faithfully
disobedient/to violate the Mandate of Heaven (天命[Tian1 Ming4])
to comply
to adhere strictly (to the rules)
already
to obey an order/to take orders/to accept a state of affairs
to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
firm view/definite opinion
